00024    using namespace Util;

00026    /*
00027    * Constructor.
00028    */
00029    IntraPairAutoCorr::IntraPairAutoCorr(System& system) 
00030     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00031       outputFile_(),
00032       accumulator_(),
00033       data_(),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       nMolecule_(-1),
00036       atom1Id_(-1),
00037       atom2Id_(-1),
00038       capacity_(-1),
00039       isInitialized_(false)
00040    {}
00041 
00042    /*
00043    * Read parameters from file, and allocate data array.
00044    */
00045    void IntraPairAutoCorr::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00046    {
00047 
00048       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00049       readInterval(in);
00050       readOutputFileName(in);
00051 
00052       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00053       read<int>(in, "atom1Id", atom1Id_);
00054       read<int>(in, "atom2Id", atom2Id_);
00055       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00056 
00057       // Validate input
00058       if (speciesId_ < 0)       
00059          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00060       if (atom1Id_ < 0)         
00061          UTIL_THROW("Negative atom1Id");
00062       if (atom2Id_ < 0)         
00063          UTIL_THROW("Negative atom2Id"); 
00064       if (atom2Id_ <= atom1Id_) 
00065          UTIL_THROW("atom2Id  <= atom1Id");
00066       if (capacity_ <= 0)        
00067          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00068       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) 
00069          UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00070 
00071       speciesPtr_ = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00072 
00073       int nAtom = speciesPtr_->nAtom();
00074       if (atom1Id_ >= nAtom) 
00075          UTIL_THROW("atom1Id >= nAtom");
00076       if (atom2Id_ >= nAtom) 
00077          UTIL_THROW("atom2Id >= nAtom");
00078 
00079       // Maximum possible number of molecules of this species
00080       int speciesCapacity = speciesPtr_->capacity();
00081 
00082       // Allocate an array of separation Vectors
00083       data_.allocate(speciesCapacity); 
00084  
00085       // Allocate memory for the AutoCorrArray accumulator object
00086       accumulator_.setParam(speciesCapacity, capacity_);
00087 
00088       isInitialized_ = true;
00089    }
00090 
00091 
00092    /*
00093    * Set actual number of molecules and clear accumulator.
00094    */
00095    void IntraPairAutoCorr::setup()
00096    {
00097       if (!isInitialized_) {
00098          UTIL_THROW("Object not initialized.");
00099       }
00100 
00101       // Set number of molecules and clear accumulator
00102       nMolecule_ = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00103       accumulator_.setNEnsemble(nMolecule_);
00104 
00105       accumulator_.clear();
00106    }
00107 
00108    /*
00109    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00110    */
00111    void IntraPairAutoCorr::sample(long iStep) 
00112    { 
00113       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00114 
00115          Molecule* moleculePtr;
00116          Vector    r1, r2, dR;
00117          int       i, j;
00118 
00119          // Validate nMolecule_
00120          if (nMolecule_ <= 0)
00121             UTIL_THROW("nMolecule <= 0");
00122          if (nMolecule_ != system().nMolecule(speciesId_)) 
00123             UTIL_THROW("Number of molecules has changed");
00124 
00125          // Loop over molecules
00126          for (i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00127             moleculePtr = &system().molecule(speciesId_, i);
00128 
00129             // Build separation between atoms atom1Id and atom2Id 
00130             // by adding separations between consecutive atoms.
00131             data_[i].zero();
00132             for (j = atom1Id_ + 1; j <= atom2Id_; ++j) {
00133                r1 = moleculePtr->atom(j-1).position();
00134                r2 = moleculePtr->atom(j).position();
00135                system().boundary().distanceSq(r1, r2, dR);
00136                data_[i] += dR;
00137             }
00138 
00139          }
00140       
00141          accumulator_.sample(data_);
00142 
00143       } // if isAtInterval
00144 
00145    }
00146 
00147    /*
00148    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00149    */
00150    void IntraPairAutoCorr::output() 
00151    {  
00152       // Echo parameters to log file
00153       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(), outputFile_);
00154       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00155       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00156       outputFile_ << "nMolecule       " << accumulator_.nEnsemble() << std::endl;
00157       outputFile_ << "bufferCapacity  " << accumulator_.bufferCapacity() << std::endl;
00158       outputFile_ << "nSample         " << accumulator_.nSample() << std::endl;
00159       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00160       outputFile_ << "average   " << accumulator_.average() << std::endl;
00161       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00162       outputFile_ << "Format of *.dat file" << std::endl;
00163       outputFile_ << "[int time in samples]  [double autocorrelation function]" 
00164                   << std::endl;
00165       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00166       outputFile_.close();
00167 
00168       // Write autocorrelation function to data file
00169       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00170       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00171       outputFile_.close();
00172 
00173    }

00178    void IntraPairAutoCorr::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00179    { ar & *this; }

00181    /*
00182    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00183    */
00184    void IntraPairAutoCorr::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00185    { ar & *this; }
